comment: general reaction The enzyme ec 2.1.1.187 specifically methylates guanine745 at N1 in 23S rRNA. The enzyme ec 2.1.1.188 specifically methylates guanine748 at N1 in 23S rRNA.
definition: S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + rRNA <=> S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + rRNA containing N1-methylguanine
name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:rRNA (guanine-N1-)-methyltransferase
